markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Experimental Clothing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1318)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 50</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn clothing

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Experimental clothing is custom tailored in radical, avant-garde styles by independent dressmakers, utilizing expensive or eccentric materials and unconventional patterns. At the GM's discretion, wearing experimental clothing may impart a +1 item bonus or –1 item penalty on checks to [Make An Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), depending on the target's fashion sense.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Experimental Clothing
